animeTitle: Danna ga Nani wo Itteiru ka Wakaranai Ken 2 Sure-me
otherNames: I Can't Understand What My Husband Is Saying: 2nd Thread, 旦那が何を言っているかわからない件2スレ目
synopsis: The anime follows the daily life of an earnest, hardworking office lady named Kaoru and her otaku husband, Hajime, who is totally immersed in a certain huge net bulletin board system.
